snippet: The search giant has added a software twist to its Web pages in China that warns users when they type a search term whose results are likely to be blocked in China.
abstract: Google adds software twist to its Web pages in China that warns users when they type a search term whose results are likely to be blocked, sidestepping any allusion to censorship.
lead_paragraph: The search giant has added a software twist to its Web pages in China that warns users when they type a search term whose results are likely to be blocked in China.

headline.main: Google to Alert Users to Chinese Censorship
headline.print_headline: China: A Google Alert on Censorship
